short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect news articles to their publisher's lite version if available

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of clicking news articles and waiting while ads, videos, and auto-playing content load? LiteNews automatically redirects you to the text-only versions of news articles if they are available. If you have a low-bandwidth connection, need the text-only versions for accessibility, or just want your news to load faster, give it a try! You can always disable redirection by using the extension's popup toggle.

LiteNews currently supports:
-CNN
-NPR
-Daily Mail
-The Christian Science Monitor
-CBC
